Question
========

From each of two normally distributed populations with equal variances a sample is drawn.______________________________. Sample 1: n = 8, mean = 18, sd = 3.4. Sample 2: n = 6, mean = 24, sd = 6.9. It is tested whether the population variances are equal. The value of the corresponding test quantity is then

Answerlist
----------

* 0.24
* 4.12
* 7.46
* 2.03

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.24: Incorrect
* 4.12: Correct
* 7.46: Incorrect
* 2.03: Incorrect
